description:
Lulu is Ai`s doll, she is turned into a human and brought up as the "daughter" of Samatarou and Tenko.
She grows up a lot faster then normal and her aspect in human form is equal to Ai.
She is mistaken to be Ai herself until she recovers her memory of the past in episode 8 but after the time turned back, she is apparently a doll again.
name: Lulu
